name: RazorPagesMovie
description: - AsyncExampleWPF -> WPF  - ConsoleApp1 -> .NET Framework - ConsoleApp2 & CLIConsoleApp -> .NET Core - MySuperLib -> .NET Standard Library - PSCsharpPlayground -> PowerShell Module - SuperGui -> .NET Framework / Windows Forms Application - WebApplication -> ASP.NET Core Web Application - XUnitTestProject -> Unit Testing
